reviews.review_msg: Very poor teaching technique. Exceptional in being rude to students. What she taught in class and what we had in our mid terms were extremely different. We all studied, but it didn't matter - our fate was already sealed the moment we walked into the classroom. If you want your GPA to drop this class is for you. Class Avg. was C+ btw

Makes a big deal about plagiarism but copies slides from online sources and claims its her's (a PEng!). Gives a difficult quiz in the start of first lecture (who recalls L.A after 3+ years). Assignments are plagiarized from online. Exams are totally unrelated to course material and SUPER tedious. Not helpful, discourages questions. Just terrible!
Poor teaching techniques. Arrogant and gets offensive if students ask any question during her lecture. Most part of hee exam is irrelevant to her teachings. Regret taking course with her.
easy going prof. neat and very nice. not much knowledge you got from the course. I used to study alone. his exam is easy but too much long. you cant finish the exam within the time given.
good guy, kindness, can get inspiration from his course.
The best Professor I have seen in my whole life, Inspirational, Caring and Kindly and friendly deliver course material.
Wants students to understand the material. Aims for quality not quantity.
Great guy and wants to prepare you for real-life outside of the classroom.

Excellent & passionate. Explains very well. One of the saving graces of ENG dept. Unique notes. I suggest to take notes however, even though he writes on his tablet and shares that but taking notes will help you to understand his notes better. Trip to Starbucks every class, helps with making new friends from class. Final and its grading were tough.

He's a true gentleman, he treats students like friends, would take his entire class and get them free coffee, he cares for his students. His teaching style is unique, he encourages you to engage and ask questions without being judgmental. He makes the topics interesting even though they're hard to grasp and abstract. Fair exams with fair grading.

He's incredibly clear in what he tries to explain. Has an uncanny knack of explaining tough mathematical ideas in simple terms. By the end of the course, you'll be surprised how easy he made it all look. He's also very charming and enthusiastic. He makes the classroom a jovial place to be, with his jokes and relaxed attitude. Simply, a Joy !!!
